body: That's what I call a really wake up call from life
wow that was garbage, I thought filters were suppose to keep this stuff out.

Jeda, this is in no way NTR, he never had a relationship with the girl, he kinda had a crush, and wasn't even available she HAS a boyfriend, the teacher gave him  a shot to bang her as an additional "perk" to getting the letter. Learn what the hell you are talking about before you try to blame others. I'm going to go a step further and even let you know what I just described wouldn't be an NTR scenario even if she was available, I just explained this much since I knew that is what you're complaining about.
